includedAssets.title: The Bourne Identity
includedAssets.synopsis: Matt Damon stars as a man with amnesia who finds himself at the centre of a manhunt. The first high-powered action thriller in the series.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Matt Damon stars as a man with amnesia who finds himself at the centre of a manhunt. The first high-powered action thriller in the series.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Matt Damon stars as a man with amnesia who finds himself at the centre of a manhunt. The first high-powered action thriller in the series.

includedAssets.title: The Bourne Supremacy
includedAssets.synopsis: Matt Damon plays the amnesiac assassin, who is forced to abandon his quiet new life when he is framed for murder. Thriller sequel.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Matt Damon plays the amnesiac assassin, who is forced to abandon his quiet new life when he is framed for murder. Thriller sequel.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Matt Damon plays the amnesiac assassin, who is forced to abandon his quiet new life when he is framed for murder. Thriller sequel.

includedAssets.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
includedAssets.synopsis: Amnesiac ex-assassin Jason Bourne tracks down the spooks responsible for turning him into a killer. Action with Matt Damon.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Amnesiac ex-assassin Jason Bourne tracks down the spooks responsible for turning him into a killer. Action with Matt Damon.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Amnesiac ex-assassin Jason Bourne tracks down the spooks responsible for turning him into a killer. Action with Matt Damon.

includedAssets.title: The Bourne Legacy
includedAssets.synopsis: Enhanced CIA assassin Jeremy Renner faces a battle to survive when his CIA employers decide to eliminate his programme.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Enhanced CIA assassin Jeremy Renner faces a battle to survive when his CIA employers decide to eliminate his programme.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Enhanced CIA assassin Jeremy Renner faces a battle to survive when his CIA employers decide to eliminate his programme.

includedAssets.title: Jason Bourne
includedAssets.synopsis: Matt Damon returns as Jason Bourne (with Paul Greengrass back in the director's chair) for the fourth outing as the unconventional amnesiac hero. Bourne is off the grid but is tempted back to the fray when he learns about a new cyber threat to  democracy organised by shady CIA director Robert Dewey (Tommy Lee Jones). However, he got to deal with Vincent Cassel's ice-cold killer and Alicia Vikander's ice cool CIA spook if he's to succeed. Top notch thrills as the action switches from Athens to Berlin to London and finally Las Vegas for a bone-jarring car chase.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Matt Damon's super-soldier emerges from the shadows when a face from his past uncovers hard-hitting secrets. Relentless action thriller.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Matt Damon returns as Jason Bourne (with Paul Greengrass back in the director's chair) for the fourth outing as the unconventional amnesiac hero. Bourne is off the grid but is tempted back to the fray when he learns about a new cyber threat to  democracy organised by shady CIA director Robert Dewey (Tommy Lee Jones). However, he got to deal with Vincent Cassel's ice-cold killer and Alicia Vikander's ice cool CIA spook if he's to succeed. Top notch thrills as the action switches from Athens to Berlin to London and finally Las Vegas for a bone-jarring car chase.

includedAssets.title: The Bourne Collection Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: All five instalments of the pioneering action series, including 2016's smash-hit Jason Bourne. Based on Robert Ludlum’s bestselling novels and starring Matt Damon, Jeremy Renner, Tommy Lee Jones and Julia Stiles.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: All five instalments of the pioneering action series, including 2016's smash-hit Jason Bourne. Matt Damon, Jeremy Renner and Julia Stiles star.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: All five instalments of the pioneering action series, including 2016's smash-hit Jason Bourne. Based on Robert Ludlum’s bestselling novels and starring Matt Damon, Jeremy Renner, Tommy Lee Jones and Julia Stiles.

includedIn.title: Bourne
includedIn.synopsis: When a CIA assassin is found floating in the Mediterranean with two gunshot wounds and severe memory loss, he embarks on a mission to find the truth about who he is.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: When a CIA assassin is found floating in the sea with gunshot wounds and severe amnesia, he embarks on a mission to find the truth about who he is.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: When a CIA assassin is found floating in the Mediterranean with two gunshot wounds and severe memory loss, he embarks on a mission to find the truth about who he is.
